text: tum unake lie kshama kee praarthana karo ya unake lie kshama kee praarthana na karo. yadi tum unake lie sattar baar bhee kshama kee praarthana karoge, to bhee allaah unhen kshama nahin karega, yah isalie ki unhonne allaah aur usake rasool ke saath kufr kiya aur allaah avagyaakaariyon ko seedha maarg nahin dikhaata
